matsim 0.1.8
  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

compareAverageTravelWait()
Bar Chart with main_mode on x-axis and average travel/wait time on y-axis
compareBasePolicyOutput()
Chooses a function to compare output_trips from the folders. baseFolder contains all base outputs, policyFolder contains all policy outputs.
compareBasePolicyShapeOutput()
Chooses a function to compare output_trips from the folders. baseFolder contains all base outputs, policyFolder contains all policy outputs.
compareModalDistanceDistribution()
Bar Chart with distance travelled on x-axis and difference of number of trips on y-axis
compareTripTypesBarChart()
Creates BarChart of changing trip types(originating,transit etc) between 2 tables and saves output to dump.output.to
createCountScatterPlot()
Creates a Via-Style scatterplot for each run
deriveODMatrix()
Creates an instance of ODMatrix(origin/destination) in conventional form or for the simwrapper
filterByRegion()
Filtering of trips_table(from readTripsTable) depending on how they located in given shape
generateXYHexagonYaml()
Creates/adds XY hexagon definition of output trips to a summary dashboard
getCrsFromConfig()
Reads an coordinate referenec system of MATSim output directory from output_config.xml
join_base_and_policy_persons()
Joins base and policy person tables
loadNetwork()
Load MATSim network into memory
mergeCountsAndLinks()
Load Counts, a limited number of Linkstats and Network links as joined tibble into memory
persons_attributes_on_hex_grid()
Overlays hexagonal grid over study area, and creates summary statistics for each pixel
plotActivityEndTimes()
Line plot that shows the number of activities ending at a given time, per activity type. The activity end time is derived from the departure time in the given trips tibble.
plotArrivalTimesPerTripPurpose()
This function plots the number of trips ending per trip purpose over time. The trip purpose corresponds to the activity type of the destination activity of a given trip. Thus, the y-axis of the plot can also be interpreted as the number of activities starting (based on the assumption that trip end time = activity start time).
plotAverageTravelWait()
Bar Chart with main_mode on x-axis and average travel/wait time on y-axis
plotDepartureTimesPerTripPurpose()
This function plots the number of trips starting per trip purpose over time. The trip purpose corresponds to the activity type of the destination activity of a given trip.
plotMapWithFilteredTrips()
Plots result of filtered trips on the map (from shape)
plotMapWithTrips()
Plots start and end coordinates of the given trips table on an osm map
plotMapWithTripsType()
Plots every type of trips(inside, outside, origin and destinating) on map
plotModalDistanceDistribution()
Bar Chart with distance travelled on x-axis and number of trips on y-axis
plotModalShiftBar()
Plot bar chart diagram of transport mode changes
plotModalShiftSankey()
Plot alluvial/sankey diagram of transport mode changes
plotModalSplitBarChart()
Plot main_mode distribution as a bar Chart
plotModalSplitPieChart()
Plot main_mode distribution as a Pie Chart
plotTripCountByDepTime()
Line plot with departure time x-axis and number of trips on y-axis
plotTripDistanceByMode()
Bar Chart with distance travelled on x-axis and number of trips on y-axis
plotTripDistancedByType()
Bar Chart with tripType on x-axis and travelled distance on y-axis
plotTripTypesPieChart()
Plots distribution of every type of trips(inside, outside, origin and destinating) in Pie Chart
prepareComparisonSimwrapperDashboardFromTable()
Creates comparison dashboard for the 2 given tables or folder with data
prepareSimwrapperDashboardFromFolder()
Creates dashboard for the given table or folder with data
prepareSimwrapperDashboardFromTable()
Creates dashboard for the given table or folder with data
processDtvEstimationQuality()
Categorize DTV deviation and aggregate data
processLinkStatsDtvDistribution()
Categorize DTV and calculate DTV distribution
readCounts()
Load a MATSim Counts file into memory
readLinkStats()
Load linkstats as tibble into memory
readPersonsTable()
Load MATSim output_persons table into memory
readTripsTable()
Load MATSIM output_trips table into Memory
symlog_trans()
A function to create symlog scaling for a plot
transformToSf()
Transforms trips_table tibble (from readTripsTable) from tibble to sf (table with attribute features and geometry feature)
transform_persons_sf()
Transforms persons_table tibble (from readPersonsTable) from tibble to sf (table with attribute features and geometry feature)

Developed by Billy Charlton, Oleksandr Soboliev.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
